s0215.chinese: 大義休明，垂于後世，順承勿革。
s0215.literal: Great righteousness shone brightly, passed down to later generations; they should obediently follow and not change it.
s0215.idiomatic: Great righteousness shone brightly, passed down to later generations; they should obediently follow and not change it.

s0216.chinese: 皇帝躬聖，既平天下，不懈於治。
s0216.literal: The Emperor personally is sage; having pacified all under Heaven, he does not slacken in governance.
s0216.idiomatic: The Emperor personally is sage; having pacified all under Heaven, he does not slacken in governance.

s0217.chinese: 夙興夜寐，建設長利，專隆教誨。
s0217.literal: Rising early and sleeping late, he establishes lasting benefits and exclusively promotes education.
s0217.idiomatic: Rising early and sleeping late, he establishes lasting benefits and exclusively promotes education.

s0218.chinese: 訓經宣達，遠近畢理，咸承聖志。
s0218.literal: Teachings and classics are proclaimed and disseminated; far and near all are well governed, all upholding the sage's will.
s0218.idiomatic: Teachings and classics are proclaimed and disseminated; far and near all are well governed, all upholding the sage's will.

s0219.chinese: 貴賤分明，男女禮順，慎遵職事。
s0219.literal: Noble and base are clearly distinguished, male and female follow propriety; they carefully follow their duties.
s0219.idiomatic: Noble and base are clearly distinguished, male and female follow propriety; they carefully follow their duties.

s0220.chinese: 昭隔內外，靡不清凈，施于後嗣。
s0220.literal: Inside and outside are clearly separated, none are not pure and clean; this is applied to later descendants.
s0220.idiomatic: Inside and outside are clearly separated, none are not pure and clean; this is applied to later descendants.

s0221.chinese: 化及無窮，遵奉遺詔，永承重戒。
s0221.literal: Transformation extends endlessly; they obey and follow the last instructions, forever upholding the weighty admonitions.
s0221.idiomatic: Transformation extends endlessly; they obey and follow the last instructions, forever upholding the weighty admonitions.

s0222.chinese: 於是乃并勃海以東，過黃、腄，窮成山，登之罘，立石頌秦德焉而去。
s0222.literal: Then he annexed the area east of the Bohai Sea, passed through Huang and Zhi, reached the end of Mount Cheng, ascended Mount Zhifu, erected stone monuments praising Qin's virtue, and departed.
s0222.idiomatic: Then he annexed the area east of the Bohai Sea, passed through Huang and Zhi, reached the end of Mount Cheng, ascended Mount Zhifu, erected stone monuments praising Qin's virtue, and departed.

s0223.chinese: 南登瑯邪，大樂之，留三月。
s0223.literal: He ascended Langye to the south and greatly enjoyed it, staying for three months.
s0223.idiomatic: He ascended Langye to the south and greatly enjoyed it, staying for three months.

s0224.chinese: 乃徙黔首三萬戶瑯邪臺下，復十二歲。
s0224.literal: He then relocated thirty thousand households of commoners to below Langye Terrace, exempting them from taxes for twelve years.
s0224.idiomatic: He then relocated thirty thousand households of commoners to below Langye Terrace, exempting them from taxes for twelve years.

s0225.chinese: 作瑯邪臺，立石刻，頌秦德，明得意。
s0225.literal: He built Langye Terrace, erected stone inscriptions praising Qin's virtue and making his intentions clear.
s0225.idiomatic: He built Langye Terrace, erected stone inscriptions praising Qin's virtue and making his intentions clear.

s0227.literal: In the twenty-eighth year, the Emperor commenced.
s0227.idiomatic: In the twenty-eighth year, the Emperor commenced.

s0228.literal: He rectified laws and regulations, the framework of all things.
s0228.idiomatic: He rectified laws and regulations, the framework of all things.

s0229.literal: To clarify human affairs and harmonize fathers and sons.
s0229.idiomatic: To clarify human affairs and harmonize fathers and sons.

s0230.literal: Sagely wisdom, benevolence, and righteousness clearly manifested the principles.
s0230.idiomatic: Sagely wisdom, benevolence, and righteousness clearly manifested the principles.

s0231.literal: He pacified the eastern lands to inspect officers and troops.
s0231.idiomatic: He pacified the eastern lands to inspect officers and troops.

s0232.literal: Affairs having been greatly completed, he came to the sea.
s0232.idiomatic: Affairs having been greatly completed, he came to the sea.

s0233.literal: The Emperor's achievement: encouraging and laboring at fundamental affairs.
s0233.idiomatic: The Emperor's achievement: encouraging and laboring at fundamental affairs.

s0234.literal: Promoting agriculture and eliminating secondary occupations, enriching the black-headed people.
s0234.idiomatic: Promoting agriculture and eliminating secondary occupations, enriching the black-headed people.
